synopsis.text: Emeralds, a minor league baseball team on the brink of obscurity, gains a new pitcher in Tatsuya, a young man seeking to carve out his own baseball legacy away from the shadow of his brothers. Meanwhile, halfway across the globe, Minami, Tatsuya's former companion, is navigating her own journey of self-discovery in Japan. Having left the world of rhythmic gymnastics behind, she finds new inspiration in a photograph capturing her final performance, leading her to pursue a career as a photographer's assistant. This heartwarming tale, a spin-off from the beloved anime series 'Touch', follows the parallel journeys of Tatsuya and Minami as they strive to find their true callings in life.
